verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen] [V: asked] [ARG1: Seth Meyers publicly apologize for comments he made at the 2011 White House Correspondent 's Dinner in order for Trump to appear on his show in 2015] .

Donald Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen asked [ARG0: Seth Meyers] [ARGM-MNR: publicly] [V: apologize] [ARG1: for comments he made at the 2011 White House Correspondent 's Dinner] [ARGM-PRP: in order for Trump to appear on his show in 2015] .

Donald Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen asked Seth Meyers publicly apologize for [ARG1: comments] [ARG0: he] [V: made] [ARGM-LOC: at the 2011 White House Correspondent 's Dinner] in order for Trump to appear on his show in 2015 .

Donald Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen asked Seth Meyers publicly apologize for comments he made at the 2011 White House Correspondent 's Dinner in order for [ARG1: Trump] to [V: appear] [ARGM-LOC: on his show] [ARGM-TMP: in 2015] .
